languages.text: "Да, и она неотразима! В ней столько жизни и энергии, сколько нет во всех аристократках столицы!"
"It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"
languages.original_text: "Да, и она неотразима! В ней столько жизни и энергии, сколько нет во всех аристократках столицы!"

traits.locale_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"
"It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"
"It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"
"It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

languages.text: “就是她，她真是光彩照人，不是吗？她是如此精力充沛、活力四射，一点都不像首都的贵族小姐！”
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: “就是她，她真是光彩照人，不是吗？她是如此精力充沛、活力四射，一点都不像首都的贵族小姐！”

languages.text: 「そうだ。息を呑むほどの美しさだろう？活力に溢れている …都のハイボーンの女性たちとは比べ物にならない！」
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。息を呑むほどの美しさだろう？活力に溢れている …都のハイボーンの女性たちとは比べ物にならない！」

languages.text: «Así es. Espectacular, ¿verdad? Tan llena de energía y de vigor... ¡No se parece en nada a las nobles de la capital!».
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Espectacular, ¿verdad? Tan llena de energía y de vigor... ¡No se parece en nada a las nobles de la capital!».

languages.text: « C'est bien elle. Ne la trouvez-vous pas sublime ? Toute cette énergie, cette verve... À mille lieues de ces dames bien nées de la capitale ! »
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien elle. Ne la trouvez-vous pas sublime ? Toute cette énergie, cette verve... À mille lieues de ces dames bien nées de la capitale ! »

languages.text: "Ist es. Sie ist der Wahnsinn, oder? So energiegeladen und voller Elan – nicht zu vergleichen mit den adeligen Damen der Hauptstadt!"
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: "Ist es. Sie ist der Wahnsinn, oder? So energiegeladen und voller Elan – nicht zu vergleichen mit den adeligen Damen der Hauptstadt!"

languages.text: "Evet, öyle. Nefes kesici, değil mi? Enerji ve coşku dolu. Başkentteki soylu leydilere hiç benzemiyor!"
languages.original_text: "It is. Isn't she breathtaking? So full of energy and verve — nothing like the highborn ladies of the capital!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet, öyle. Nefes kesici, değil mi? Enerji ve coşku dolu. Başkentteki soylu leydilere hiç benzemiyor!"
